name: Kingdom of Ash Demo
description:
When the ash stops falling, who will you choose to be?After ten years, the particulate matter blocking the sun’s light has begun to dissipate. As humans emerge to reestablish life on the surface, you must decide how you want to participate in the new world that is beginning.

Use your wits and skills to survive long enough to secure a lasting legacy in Mesquakie Township. With multiple endings and different branches of possibility, you can re-explore (and discover the awful truth) about your past and craft new meaning in your future.

***

Created with: Visual Novel Maker

Narrative and story illustrations made by Lindsay Pierce.
Movies and click-scenes designed using Canva.

Huge thanks to the music community for the
